name: discord-bot-dashboard
description: A modular Discord bot with a web control panel.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && javascript-obfuscator bot.js --config obfuscator.json --output dist/bot.js && javascript-obfuscator setup.js --config obfuscator.json --output dist/setup.js && javascript-obfuscator routes --config obfuscator.json --output dist/routes && javascript-obfuscator modules --config obfuscator.json --output dist/modules && cpx "./{public,db,commands}/**/*.{json,ejs,html,css,js}" dist && cpx "./*.json" dist && cpx "./KURULUM.md" dist
